content: **linked stitch ear warmers** ======================================= these easy ear warmers are sure to become your go-to fall accessory the pattern is written for six sizes from baby to adult l ensuring a perfect and cozy fit to fit head circumference* baby 14 -16 / 35 5cm - 40 5cm toddler 16 -18 / 40 5cm - 45 5cm child 18 -20 / 45 5cm - 51cm tween 20 -22 / 51cm - 56cm adult small 22 -23 / 56cm - 58 5cm adult large 23 -24 / 58 5cm - 61cm **video** you can find a full video tutorial to accompany the written pattern here https //youtu be/kdvtgpbl4ps 1 **materials** yarn any dk weight yarn baby 66yds / 60m toddler 79yds / 72m child 123yds / 112m tween 133yds / 122m adult s 185yds / 169m adult l 185yds / 169m hook 4 5mm us 7 crochet hook 3 or hook required to meet gauge --- **join my newsletter ** ======================================== subscribe to my newsletter 4 to be kept in the loop about pattern releases freebies sales and much more ---- © ned & mimi 2024 you are free to use this pattern to create finished products for sale in fact i would be honoured if selling finished products from this pattern online i do ask that you give credit for the pattern to ned & mimi and link back to http //www nedandmimi com *due to the nature of the pdf files sales i cannot refund any patterns as it is not possible to return the purchase however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns * *the photographs and pattern contained in this pattern are the property of ned & mimi © this pattern is for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is permitted * 1 https //youtu be/kdvtgpbl4ps 3 https //shrsl com/3p74i 4 https //nedandmimi com/subscribe
